Title: Out of Gas
Plot: In a delirious state after Serenity's engine explodes, draining the ship of its oxygen supply, Mal has a series of flashbacks about how he came to own Serenity and form his crew.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Lyle Kanouse, Dax Griffin, Roderick l. McCarthy, Steven Flynn, Ilia Volok
